comments.author: Dave
comments.body: "Hello, this is Frenzy Headquarters. How may we help you?" "Yes, I'm calling about your ad: _Learn to Trash Talk While You Sleep._ I'd like to order the tapes." "You're talking about the tapes produced by our CEO and spiritual kingpin Steve Bailey?" "That sounds right... The ones that promise to turn you into a shard-spitting monster in just two weeks." "Great. We can have those shipped to you by the end of the month." "Oh jeez, I can't wait that long! I'm getting beat up something fierce out here. I need those tapes yesterday!" "You sound like a motivated buyer. We could overnight them, but it's pricey." "Money's no object; I'm flush, believe me. I just need to get armed and soon. I can't even defend myself against a senior citizen at this point. I want an acid tongue and a styrofoam conscience like Mr. Bailey. His stuff makes your brain pucker." "Okay fine, we'll get the order started for you right away in that case. Can I have your name, please?" "I'll spell it for you; it's kind of unusual. B-A-R-R-A-C-K O-B-A..."
